package.name: kurt_navigation
package.description:
This package contains configurations and launch file to make various (2d) navigation components usable for KURT. Further there are three top level launch files doing the following:
# slam.launch - starts gmapping, frontier exploration and move_base for semi-automatic 2d mapping # single_map_navigation.launch - starts move_base and move_base using a single map for navigation # dual_map_navigation.launch - starts move_base and move_base using two different maps for navigation and localization
As the latter two launch files require prepared maps they are intended to be included in more sophisticated launch files, located elsewhere, e.g. kurt_navigation_experiments.
package.author: Jochen Sprickerhof, Henning Deeken
